attributes.action: Stop the wide spread of panic buying dry goods and loo rolls
attributes.additional_details:
Stop people panic buying since if everyone is in the same area surely thats only going to increase the risk of this virus spreading 
Limit dry goods and loo rolls (depending on size of the family) 
Stop wide spread panic for no reason
attributes.background: As you know everyone is in wide spread panic over coronavirus, completely understandable since it is the biggest scare since Ebola but this has been taken completely out of proportion by mainstream media and since everyone likes to read what the news says, everyone’s gone barking mad.

rejection.details: We think this petition is similar: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300766
